content: For more details on how to stop services, please refer to our <1>{{link}}</1>.

comment.text: This translation key provides a message to be displayed when users need more information on how to stop services. It includes a link to the company's help center for further assistance.

usage.context:
</Text>
 {encryptionBlockHelpUrl ? (
 <Text>
 <Trans
 t={t}
 i18nKey="MoreDetails"
 ns="Management"
 values={{ link: t("Common:HelpCenter") }}
 components={{
 1: (
 <Link

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Xidmətlərin dayandırılması haqqında" is a bit clunky. A more natural phrasing would be "Xidmətlərə dayandırma ilə bağlı" or simply "Xidmətlərin dayandırılması ilə bağlı".
The phrase 'nəzərdən keçirin' is a bit formal. 'Baxa bilərsiniz' or 'Öyrənin' might be more appropriate depending on the intended tone.
The translation "Další podrobnosti o zastavení služeb naleznete pod <1>{{link}}</1>." implies the details are *under* the link, which isn't the intended meaning. The English says 'refer to'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Další podrobnosti o zastavení služeb naleznete v <1>{{link}}</1>.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'Ծառայությունները' is a slightly archaic or formal way to say 'services'. A more common and modern form would be 'ծառայությունները'.

The English phrase "For more details" is translated as "자세한 내용은" which, while technically correct, can sound a bit stiff in this context. A more natural and conversational Korean translation would be something like "자세한 방법은" or "자세한 내용은 아래".

The Lao translation "ຍິ່ງໄປກວ່ານັ້ນ" (ying pai kwan nan) which translates to 'furthermore' or 'in addition' doesn't accurately reflect the English "For more details". It introduces an unnecessary transition.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Replace "ຍິ່ງໄປກວ່ານັ້ນ" with something more directly translating to 'for more details', such as 'ຖ້າທ່ານຕ້ອງການຂໍ້ມູນເພີ່ມເຕີມ' (tha tan wan tong hum kham phom tim) or a more natural phrasing like 'ສໍາລັບຂໍ້ມູນເພີ່ມເຕີມ' (sam lap hum kham phom tim).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrasing 'ວິທີຢຸດການບໍານານຸການ' (wi thi yut gan bananukan) is a literal and somewhat formal translation of 'how to stop services'. While technically correct, it might be too formal for the intended audience. Consider a more colloquial or simpler phrasing.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider alternatives like 'ວິທີປິດການບໍານານຸການ' (wi thi bit gan bananukan) - 'how to close services' or a simplified phrase like 'ວິທີຢຸດບໍານານຸການ' (wi thi yut bananukan) - 'how to stop services'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The English phrase "For more details" is better translated as "Szczegóły dotyczące" or "Więcej informacji na temat" rather than just "Aby dowiedzieć się więcej na temat". While "Aby dowiedzieć się więcej na temat" isn't *incorrect*, it's less natural in this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Aby uzyskać więcej szczegółów na temat tego, jak zatrzymać usługi, sprawdź nasz <1>{{link}}</1>.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'intreruperea' is a valid word, but 'întreruperea' would be more accurate and commonly used for 'stopping' or 'interruption' in this context.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Pentru informaţii suplimentare despre întreruperea serviciilor, consultaţi <1>{{link}}</1>.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'ආරක්ෂිත සේවා' translates to 'protected services' which isn't accurate. It should convey 'services' generally. The English phrase 'services' is too generic to be translated literally and needs more context. A more accurate translation for 'services' in this context would be something like 'සේවාවන්' or 'ක්‍රියාත්මක වන සේවා'.
The phrase "xin vui lòng tham khảo" is overly formal for the context. A more natural translation would be "xin mời tham khảo" or simply "tham khảo".
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Thay đổi "xin vui lòng tham khảo" thành "xin mời tham khảo" hoặc "tham khảo".

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Vietnamese translation contains "của chúng tôi" after the link tag. It’s more natural to have it before the tag if the intention is to emphasize it belongs to the company. However, the English doesn’t specify the position.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider moving "của chúng tôi" before the link tag for better flow, but ensure alignment with the original intent.
